mapper.select: select place_id from f_place where mid=(select id from f_mesh where mesh_id=#{meshId} and uid=#{uid}) and uid=#{uid} order by place_id desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into f_place (place_id,pname,uid,mid,create_date,update_date) VALUES(#{placeId},#{pname},#{uid},(select id from f_mesh where mesh_id=#{meshId} and uid=#{uid}),now(),now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from f_place where mid=(select id from f_mesh where mesh_id=#{meshId} and uid=#{uid}) and uid=#{uid} and pname=#{pname}
mapper.update: update f_place set pname=#{pname} where id=#{pid}
mapper.select: select id as pid,mid from f_place where mid=(select id from f_mesh where mesh_id=#{meshId} and uid=#{uid})
